About Scalar ONLINE

Join us for the first fully online, all-day all-timezone Scala conference!

15 May 2020, at your home.

As we’ve joined stayinghomeclub and Scalar 2020 has been postponed to 8-10th of October 2020, we’re taking Scalar online to meet with all of you in spring.

Scalar ONLINE will be fully online, all-day all-timezone Scala conference with 45min presentations, Q&A sessions and networking opportunities. Let’s meet, learn and celebrate Functional Programming!

SCALAR ONLINE IN SHORT:
ONLINE

Stay up to date, learn new skills and exchange FP knowledge while staying home.

Global

Enjoy all-day filled with presentations, Q&As and networking sessions.

More than 30 speakers

Talk to world-class experts in Functional Programming.

Community

Meet other FP enthusiasts from all over the world.


to top

Call for papers

OPEN UNTIL APRIL 23RD 2020. We'll accept speakers on a rolling basis.

We are looking for anything that you think might be interesting for current and future Scala programmers. Are you using Scala in a novel way? Maybe you contribute to a Scala open-source library? Or you are using Scala in production and would like to share your experiences from the field?

Our main goal is to give attendees a portion of practical knowledge during the conference, update people on what's happening in the Scala ecosystem and start some interesting (online) discussions. We wish to inspire people to explore Scala and the Scala ecosystem later at home.

What we offer:

  • technical help in setting up the streaming with a practice session
  • ongoing assistance during your presentation
  • moderation of questions that will pop up during and after your presentation
  • a moderated after-presentation Q&A with attendees
apply now

Become a sponsor

As a sponsor of Scalar ONLINE, you have the chance to present your company to growing functional programming community and to make valuable contacts while staying at home and keeping everyone safe. Join Scalar and impress our attendees with your expertise.
